segments.text: Hello , Mr . Smith , I am returning to Shanghai by the 10:00 plane . I am calling to thank you for all your help during my stay here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't mention it . It's been my pleasure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next time you are in Shanghai , please let me know , and let me be of some assistance to you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have a nice flight back , and take care . Thanks for your call .
segments.speaker: S1
